{{cpp/chrono/title|operator&lt;&lt;{{petty|(std::chrono::hh_mm_ss)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/hh_mm_ss/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits, class Duration &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os,
                const std::chrono::hh_mm_ss&lt;Duration&gt;&amp; t );
}}

Outputs {{c|t}} into the stream {{c|os}}.

Equivalent to {{c|return os &lt;&lt; std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:L%T}"), hms);}} where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:L%T}")}} is {{c|"{:L%T}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|char}}, and {{c|L"{:L%T}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|wchar_t}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|os|the output stream}}
{{par|t|the time of day to be output}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|os}}
